printed_text:
[click],[click],[click]: Place 1 agenda counter on Domestic Sleepers.
Domestic Sleepers is worth 1 agenda point while it has at least 1 agenda counter on it.
stripped_printed_text: click,click,click: Place 1 agenda counter on Domestic Sleepers. Domestic Sleepers is worth 1 agenda point while it has at least 1 agenda counter on it.

flavor: The networking capabilities of the NEXT suite of ice are unparalleled.
printed_text: NEXT Silver gains "[subroutine] End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.
stripped_printed_text: NEXT Silver gains "Subroutine End the run." for each rezzed piece of NEXT ice.

flavor: "Chi resonance mapping has created a whole new field of network security. It is unassailable perfection." -Akitaro Watanabe
printed_text:
The strength of this ice cannot be lowered.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: The strength of this ice cannot be lowered. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice.
Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this operation, trash a rezzed piece of ice. Reveal cards from the top of R&D until you reveal a piece of ice. Install and rez that ice in the same position as the ice that was trashed, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.

printed_text: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: The first time each turn you create a remote server, draw 1 card.

flavor: Works better than a PAD hooked up to a tinfoil umbrella and coffee can.
printed_text:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits during traces.
stripped_printed_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits during traces.

flavor: Halfway upstalk, Midway is a destination unto itself with its microgravity hotels and fine dining options.
printed_text: The Runner must pay 1[credit] as an additional cost each time he or she uses an icebreaker to break at least 1 subroutine during a run on this server. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: The Runner must pay 1 credit as an additional cost each time he or she uses an icebreaker to break at least 1 subroutine during a run on this server. Limit 1 region per server.

flavor: They said it couldn't be built. That it was a fantasy. That Jack Weyland was a fool, and he had bought the fools in Washington too. But year after year the buckyweave grew, and 'they' stopped talking.
printed_text:
3[recurring-credit]
Use these credits to advance, install, and rez cards.
stripped_printed_text: 3 recurring credits Use these credits to advance, install, and rez cards.

flavor: Taurus promised strength, but gave only rage.
printed_text: [subroutine] <trace>Trace 2</trace> If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 piece of hardware.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trace 2 If successful, trash 1 piece of hardware. If your trace strength is 5 or greater, trash 1 piece of hardware.

flavor: On the first day She breathed data into the void, and it hung suspended like jewelled stars. On the second day She spoke order into the data, and it flowed from rivulets into streams and from streams into mighty rivers. On the third day She gave independence to the order, and it ebbed and flowed according to its own accord. -The Cant of Helios
printed_text:
Mother Goddess gains the subtypes of all other rezzed ice.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Mother Goddess gains the subtypes of all other rezzed ice. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: He who bears the shield of honor.
printed_text: When the Runner encounters Galahad, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Galahad gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. [subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: When the Runner encounters Galahad, you may reveal up to 2 grail ice from HQ. For the remainder of this run, Galahad gains the subroutines of the revealed ice in the order of your choice. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: Known as malware 0-394-41525-6 to sysops, runners just refer to it as "bad times."
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
The Runner's memory limit is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner is tagged. The Runner's memory limit is reduced by 2 until the end of the turn.

printed_text:
Play only as your first [click].
Choose a server. The Corp can rez a piece of ice protecting this server. If he or she does not, make a run on that server, during which the Corp cannot rez ice.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. Choose a server. The Corp can rez a piece of ice protecting this server. If he or she does not, make a run on that server, during which the Corp cannot rez ice.

printed_text:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1[credit].
Trash Lamprey if the Corp purges virus counters.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, the Corp loses 1 credit. Trash Lamprey if the Corp purges virus counters.

flavor: His eyes were beginning to blur, as he duplicated the credentials for what seemed like the fiftieth time. Perhaps a genetic refit would have been easier.
printed_text:
Play only as your first [click].
Remove all tags.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. Remove all tags.

flavor: "Public network kiosks, vending machines-there's all sorts of poorly-secured power sources in the city. Tap in to one of these and you've got plenty of juice when you need it. A little advance warning when the power grid starts misbehaving, too." -Gabriel Santiago
printed_text: Gain 1[credit] whenever a trace is initiated.
stripped_printed_text: Gain 1 credit whenever a trace is initiated.

printed_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice after an approach during which that ice was rezzed, lose all credits in your credit pool. Gain credits equal to the rez cost of that ice.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of ice after an approach during which that ice was rezzed, lose all credits in your credit pool. Gain credits equal to the rez cost of that ice.

printed_text:
Play only as your first [click].
Choose an unrezzed piece of ice. If the Corp rezzes that piece of ice this turn, gain credits equal to its rez cost.
stripped_printed_text: Play only as your first click. Choose an unrezzed piece of ice. If the Corp rezzes that piece of ice this turn, gain credits equal to its rez cost.

flavor: "I once saw someone running a seven-tier nested daemon tree. Not for any good reason, just to see if he could. Well, of course the root daemon crashed and he lost everything. I wonder what he's up to now?" -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
printed_text: Leprechaun can host up to 2 programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit.
stripped_printed_text: Leprechaun can host up to 2 programs. The memory costs of hosted programs do not count against your memory limit.

printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may install this program from your grip, ignoring all costs. [trash]: The Corp draws 2 cards. Limit 1 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, instead of breaching R&D, you may install this program from your grip, ignoring all costs. trash: The Corp draws 2 cards. Limit 1 per deck.
